verses.verse: And in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> <S%H2472>dreams,<s%> with which his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was <S%H6470>troubled,<s%> and his <S%H8142>sleep<s%> <S%H1961>broke<s%> from him.

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>commanded<s%> to <S%H7121>call<s%> the <S%H2748>magicians,<s%> and the <S%H825>astrologers,<s%> and the <S%H3784>sorcerers,<s%> and the <S%H3779>Chaldeans,<s%> for to <S%H5046>show<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> his <S%H2472>dreams.<s%> So they <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, I have <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was <S%H6470>troubled<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H2472>dream.<s%>

Then <S%H1696>spoke<s%> the <S%H3779>Chaldeans<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H762>Syriack,<s%> O <S%H4430>king,<s%> <S%H2418>live<s%> for <S%H5957>ever:<s%> <S%H560>tell<s%> your <S%H5649>servants<s%> the <S%H2493>dream,<s%> and we will <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation.<s%>

The <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> to the <S%H3779>Chaldeans,<s%> The <S%H4406>thing<s%> is <S%H230>gone<s%> from me: <S%H2006>if<s%> you will not make <S%H3046>known<s%> to me the <S%H2493>dream,<s%> with the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof, you shall be <S%H5648>cut<s%> in <S%H1917>pieces,<s%> and your <S%H1005>houses<s%> shall be <S%H7761>made<s%> a <S%H5122>dunghill.<s%>

But <S%H2006>if<s%> you <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H2493>dream,<s%> and the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof, you shall <S%H6902>receive<s%> of me <S%H4978>gifts<s%> and <S%H5023>rewards<s%> and <S%H7690>great<s%> <S%H3367>honor:<s%> <S%H2006>therefore<s%> <S%H2324>show<s%> me the <S%H2493>dream,<s%> and the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof.

They <S%H6032>answered<s%> <S%H8579>again<s%> and <S%H560>said,<s%> Let the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H560>tell<s%> his <S%H5649>servants<s%> the <S%H2493>dream,<s%> and we will <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> of it.

The <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> and <S%H560>said,<s%> I <S%H3046>know<s%> of <S%H3330>certainty<s%> that you would <S%H2084>gain<s%> the <S%H5732>time,<s%> <S%H3606>because<s%> you <S%H2370>see<s%> the <S%H4406>thing<s%> is <S%H230>gone<s%> from me.

But <S%H2006>if<s%> you will not make <S%H3046>known<s%> to me the <S%H2493>dream,<s%> there is but <S%H2298>one<s%> <S%H1882>decree<s%> for you: for you have <S%H2164>prepared<s%> <S%H3538>lying<s%> and <S%H7844>corrupt<s%> <S%H4406>words<s%> to <S%H560>speak<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> me, <S%H5704>till<s%> the <S%H5732>time<s%> be <S%H8133>changed:<s%> <S%H2006>therefore<s%> <S%H560>tell<s%> me the <S%H2493>dream,<s%> and I shall <S%H3046>know<s%> that you can <S%H2324>show<s%> me the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof.

The <S%H3779>Chaldeans<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> and <S%H560>said,<s%> There is not a <S%H606>man<s%> on the <S%H3007>earth<s%> that <S%H3202>can<s%> <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H4430>king's<s%> <S%H4406>matter:<s%> <S%H3606>therefore<s%> there is <S%H3606>no<s%> <S%H3809><s%> <S%H4430>king,<s%> <S%H7229>lord,<s%> nor <S%H7990>ruler,<s%> that <S%H7593>asked<s%> <S%H1836>such<s%> things at <S%H3606>any<s%> <S%H2749>magician,<s%> or <S%H826>astrologer,<s%> or <S%H3777>Chaldean.<s%>

And it is a <S%H3358>rare<s%> <S%H4406>thing<s%> that the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H7593>requires,<s%> and there is <S%H3809>none<s%> <S%H321>other<s%> that can <S%H2324>show<s%> it <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> <S%H3861>except<s%> the <S%H426>gods,<s%> <S%H1768>whose<s%> <S%H4070>dwelling<s%> is not with <S%H1321>flesh.<s%>

For <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H3606>cause<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> was <S%H1149>angry<s%> and <S%H7690>very<s%> <S%H7108>furious,<s%> and <S%H560>commanded<s%> to <S%H7>destroy<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon.<s%>

And the <S%H1882>decree<s%> <S%H5312>went<s%> <S%H5312>forth<s%> that the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men should be <S%H6992>slain;<s%> and they <S%H1158>sought<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> and his <S%H2269>fellows<s%> to be <S%H6992>slain.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H8421>answered<s%> with <S%H5843>counsel<s%> and <S%H2942>wisdom<s%> to <S%H746>Arioch<s%> the <S%H7229>captain<s%> of the <S%H4430>king's<s%> <S%H2877>guard,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> was <S%H5312>gone<s%> <S%H5312>forth<s%> to <S%H6992>slay<s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon:<s%>

He <S%H6032>answered<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> to <S%H746>Arioch<s%> the <S%H4430>king's<s%> <S%H7990>captain,<s%> <S%H5922>Why<s%> <S%H4101><s%> is the <S%H1882>decree<s%> so <S%H2685>hasty<s%> from the <S%H4430>king?<s%> <S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H746>Arioch<s%> made the <S%H4406>thing<s%> <S%H3046>known<s%> to <S%H1841>Daniel.<s%>

Then <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H5954>went<s%> in, and <S%H1156>desired<s%> of the <S%H4430>king<s%> that he would <S%H5415>give<s%> him <S%H2166>time,<s%> and that he would <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H236>went<s%> to his <S%H1005>house,<s%> and made the <S%H4406>thing<s%> <S%H3046>known<s%> to <S%H2608>Hananiah,<s%> <S%H4332>Mishael,<s%> and <S%H5839>Azariah,<s%> his <S%H2269>companions:<s%>

That they would <S%H1156>desire<s%> <S%H7359>mercies<s%> of the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%> <S%H5922>concerning<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H7328>secret;<s%> that <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> and his <S%H2269>fellows<s%> should not <S%H7>perish<s%> with the <S%H7606>rest<s%> of the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> was the <S%H7328>secret<s%> <S%H1541>revealed<s%> to <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> in a <S%H3916>night<s%> <S%H2376>vision.<s%> <S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H1289>blessed<s%> the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven.<s%>

<S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> and <S%H560>said,<s%> <S%H1289>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H8036>name<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> for <S%H5957>ever<s%> and <S%H5957>ever:<s%> for <S%H2452>wisdom<s%> and <S%H1370>might<s%> are his:

And he <S%H8133>changes<s%> the <S%H5732>times<s%> and the <S%H2166>seasons:<s%> he <S%H5709>removes<s%> <S%H4430>kings,<s%> and <S%H6966>sets<s%> up <S%H4430>kings:<s%> he <S%H3052>gives<s%> <S%H2452>wisdom<s%> to the <S%H2445>wise,<s%> and <S%H998>knowledge<s%> to them that <S%H3046>know<s%> <S%H999>understanding:<s%>

He <S%H1541>reveals<s%> the <S%H5994>deep<s%> and <S%H5642>secret<s%> things: he <S%H3046>knows<s%> <S%H4101>what<s%> is in the <S%H2816>darkness,<s%> and the <S%H5094>light<s%> <S%H8271>dwells<s%> with him.

I <S%H3029>thank<s%> you, and <S%H7624>praise<s%> you, O you <S%H426>God<s%> of my <S%H2>fathers,<s%> <S%H1768>who<s%> have <S%H3052>given<s%> me <S%H2452>wisdom<s%> and <S%H1370>might,<s%> and have made <S%H3046>known<s%> to me <S%H3705>now<s%> <S%H1768>what<s%> we <S%H1156>desired<s%> of you: for you have <S%H3705>now<s%> made <S%H3046>known<s%> to us the <S%H4430>king's<s%> <S%H4406>matter.<s%>

<S%H3606>Therefore<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H5954>went<s%> in to <S%H746>Arioch,<s%> <S%H1768>whom<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> had <S%H4483>ordained<s%> to <S%H7>destroy<s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon:<s%> he <S%H236>went<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> <S%H3652>thus<s%> to him; <S%H7>Destroy<s%> not the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon:<s%> <S%H5924>bring<s%> me in <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> and I will <S%H2324>show<s%> to the <S%H4430>king<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> <S%H746>Arioch<s%> <S%H5954>brought<s%> in <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> in <S%H927>haste,<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> <S%H3652>thus<s%> to him, I have <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H1400>man<s%> of the <S%H1123>captives<s%> <S%H1547><s%> of <S%H3061>Judah,<s%> that will make <S%H3046>known<s%> to the <S%H4430>king<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation.<s%>

The <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> to <S%H1841>Daniel,<s%> <S%H1768>whose<s%> <S%H8036>name<s%> was <S%H1096>Belteshazzar,<s%> <S%H383>Are<s%> you <S%H3546>able<s%> to make <S%H3046>known<s%> to me the <S%H2493>dream<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> I have <S%H2370>seen,<s%> and the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof?

<S%H1841>Daniel<s%> <S%H6032>answered<s%> in the <S%H6925>presence<s%> of the <S%H4430>king,<s%> and <S%H560>said,<s%> The <S%H7328>secret<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> has <S%H7593>demanded<s%> <S%H3809>cannot<s%> <S%H3202><s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men, the <S%H826>astrologers,<s%> the <S%H2749>magicians,<s%> the <S%H1505>soothsayers,<s%> <S%H2324>show<s%> to the <S%H4430>king;<s%>

But there is a <S%H426>God<s%> in <S%H8065>heaven<s%> that <S%H1541>reveals<s%> <S%H7328>secrets,<s%> and makes <S%H3046>known<s%> to the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4101>what<s%> shall be in the <S%H320>latter<s%> <S%H3118>days.<s%> Your <S%H2493>dream,<s%> and the <S%H2376>visions<s%> of your <S%H7217>head<s%> on your <S%H4903>bed,<s%> are <S%H1836>these;<s%>

As for you, O <S%H4430>king,<s%> your <S%H7476>thoughts<s%> <S%H5559>came<s%> into your mind on your <S%H4903>bed,<s%> <S%H4101>what<s%> should <S%H1934>come<s%> to pass <S%H311>hereafter:<s%> <S%H1836><s%> and he that <S%H1541>reveals<s%> <S%H7328>secrets<s%> makes <S%H3046>known<s%> to you <S%H4101>what<s%> shall <S%H1934>come<s%> to pass.

But as for me, <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H7328>secret<s%> is not <S%H1541>revealed<s%> to me for any <S%H2452>wisdom<s%> that I <S%H383>have<s%> <S%H4481>more<s%> <S%H4481>than<s%> <S%H3606>any<s%> <S%H2417>living,<s%> but for their <S%H1701>sakes<s%> that shall make <S%H3046>known<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> to the <S%H4430>king,<s%> and that you might <S%H3046>know<s%> the <S%H7476>thoughts<s%> of your <S%H3825>heart.<s%>

You, O <S%H4430>king,<s%> <S%H2370>saw,<s%> and <S%H431>behold<s%> a <S%H7690>great<s%> <S%H6755>image.<s%> <S%H1797>This<s%> <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H6755>image,<s%> whose <S%H2122>brightness<s%> was <S%H3493>excellent,<s%> <S%H6966>stood<s%> <S%H6903>before<s%> you; and the <S%H7299>form<s%> thereof was <S%H1763>terrible.<s%>

<S%H1931>This<s%> <S%H6755>image's<s%> <S%H7217>head<s%> was of <S%H2869>fine<s%> <S%H1722>gold,<s%> his <S%H2306>breast<s%> and his <S%H1872>arms<s%> of <S%H3702>silver,<s%> his <S%H4577>belly<s%> and his <S%H3410>thighs<s%> of <S%H5174>brass,<s%>
His <S%H8243>legs<s%> of <S%H6523>iron,<s%> his <S%H7271>feet<s%> <S%H4481>part<s%> of <S%H6523>iron<s%> and <S%H4481>part<s%> of <S%H2635>clay.<s%>

You <S%H2370>saw<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> that a <S%H69>stone<s%> was <S%H1505>cut<s%> out <S%H1768>without<s%> <S%H3809><s%> <S%H3028>hands,<s%> which <S%H4223>smote<s%> the <S%H6755>image<s%> on his <S%H7271>feet<s%> that were of <S%H6523>iron<s%> and <S%H2635>clay,<s%> and <S%H1855>broke<s%> them to pieces.

<S%H116>Then<s%> was the <S%H6523>iron,<s%> the <S%H2635>clay,<s%> the <S%H5174>brass,<s%> the <S%H3702>silver,<s%> and the <S%H1722>gold,<s%> <S%H1854>broken<s%> to pieces <S%H2298>together,<s%> and <S%H1934>became<s%> like the <S%H5784>chaff<s%> of the <S%H7007>summer<s%> threshing <S%H147>floors;<s%> and the <S%H7308>wind<s%> <S%H5376>carried<s%> them away, that <S%H3606>no<s%> <S%H3809><s%> <S%H870>place<s%> was <S%H7912>found<s%> for them: and the <S%H69>stone<s%> that <S%H4223>smote<s%> the <S%H6755>image<s%> <S%H1934>became<s%> a <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H2906>mountain,<s%> and <S%H4391>filled<s%> the <S%H3606>whole<s%> <S%H772>earth.<s%>
<S%H1836>This<s%> is the <S%H2493>dream;<s%> and we will <S%H560>tell<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> thereof <S%H6925>before<s%> the <S%H4430>king.<s%>

You, O <S%H4430>king,<s%> are a <S%H4430>king<s%> of <S%H4430>kings:<s%> for the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%> has <S%H3052>given<s%> you a <S%H4437>kingdom,<s%> <S%H2632>power,<s%> and <S%H8632>strength,<s%> and <S%H3367>glory.<s%>

And <S%H3606>wherever<s%> <S%H1768><s%> the <S%H1123>children<s%> of <S%H606>men<s%> <S%H1753>dwell,<s%> the <S%H2423>beasts<s%> of the <S%H1251>field<s%> and the <S%H5776>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8065>heaven<s%> has he <S%H3052>given<s%> into your <S%H3028>hand,<s%> and has made you <S%H7981>ruler<s%> over them <S%H3606>all.<s%> You are <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H7217>head<s%> of <S%H1722>gold.<s%>

And <S%H870>after<s%> you shall <S%H6966>arise<s%> <S%H317>another<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> <S%H772>inferior<s%> to you, and <S%H317>another<s%> <S%H8523>third<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5174>brass,<s%> <S%H1768>which<s%> shall <S%H7981>bear<s%> <S%H7981>rule<s%> over <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H772>earth.<s%>

And the <S%H7244>fourth<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%H8624>strong<s%> as <S%H6523>iron:<s%> for as <S%H3606>much<s%> as <S%H6523>iron<s%> <S%H1855>breaks<s%> in pieces and <S%H2827>subdues<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> things: and as <S%H6523>iron<s%> that <S%H7490>breaks<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H459>these,<s%> shall it <S%H1855>break<s%> in pieces and <S%H7490>bruise.<s%>

And <S%H1768>whereas<s%> you <S%H2370>saw<s%> the <S%H7271>feet<s%> and <S%H677>toes,<s%> <S%H4481>part<s%> of <S%H6353>potters'<s%> <S%H2635>clay,<s%> and <S%H4481>part<s%> of <S%H6523>iron,<s%> the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%H6386>divided;<s%> but there shall be in it of the <S%H5326>strength<s%> of the <S%H6523>iron,<s%> for as <S%H3606>much<s%> as you <S%H2370>saw<s%> the <S%H6523>iron<s%> <S%H6151>mixed<s%> with <S%H2917>miry<s%> <S%H2635>clay.<s%>

And as the <S%H677>toes<s%> of the <S%H7271>feet<s%> were <S%H4481>part<s%> of <S%H6523>iron,<s%> and <S%H4481>part<s%> of <S%H2635>clay,<s%> so the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%H7118>partly<s%> <S%H8624>strong,<s%> and <S%H7118>partly<s%> <S%H8406>broken.<s%>

And <S%H1768>whereas<s%> you <S%H2370>saw<s%> <S%H6523>iron<s%> <S%H6151>mixed<s%> with <S%H2917>miry<s%> <S%H2635>clay,<s%> they shall <S%H6151>mingle<s%> themselves with the <S%H2234>seed<s%> of <S%H606>men:<s%> but they shall not <S%H1693>join<s%> <S%H1836>one<s%> to <S%H1836>another,<s%> <S%H1887>even<s%> as <S%H6523>iron<s%> is not <S%H6151>mixed<s%> with <S%H2635>clay.<s%>
